channel.title: Sustainability on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Sustainability on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Back of the Napkin
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Napkins are something of a necessary evil of eating, especially in paper form. We need them to keep our fingers clean, but inevitably, they get thrown away. (Unlike straws, however, they naturally biodegrade, which is a point in their favor.) But as it turns out, the napkin is in trouble. People are apparently missing the long-term value of using these paper devices to clean their hands after they dive head-first into a burrito.
